title: Compiler Design
subtitle: Understand the theory and implementation of compilers

topics.title: Introduction to Compilers
topics.description: What is a Compiler?,Compiler vs Interpreter,Phases of a Compiler,Compiler Structure

topics.title: Lexical Analysis
topics.description: Role of Lexical Analyzer,Tokens, Lexemes, and Patterns,Regular Expressions,Finite Automata (NFA & DFA),Lexical Errors and Recovery

topics.title: Syntax Analysis
topics.description: Context-Free Grammars (CFG),Parse Trees and Derivations,Top-Down Parsing (LL(1)),Bottom-Up Parsing (LR(0), SLR, Canonical LR, LALR),FIRST and FOLLOW Sets,Parser Error Handling

topics.title: Semantic Analysis
topics.description: Syntax-Directed Translation,Attributes (Synthesized & Inherited),Type Checking and Type Systems,Symbol Table Management,Static and Dynamic Scoping

topics.title: Intermediate Code Generation
topics.description: Three-Address Code (TAC),Quadruples and Triples,Syntax Trees and DAGs,Postfix Notation,Backpatching

topics.title: Code Optimization
topics.description: Need for Optimization,Peephole Optimization,Control Flow Graph (CFG),DAGs for Basic Blocks,Loop Optimization (Unrolling, Invariant Code Motion),Data Flow Analysis

topics.title: Target Code Generation
topics.description: Target Machine Architecture,Instruction Selection,Register Allocation and Assignment,Evaluation Order,Code Emission Techniques

topics.title: Compiler Tools and Automation
topics.description: Overview of Lex and YACC,Lexical Analyzer Generation with LEX,Parser Generation with YACC,Integration of LEX & YACC
